participant_1.background:
I took medication to help with my dust allergy so I could write my book.
my favorite music is country.
My phone will be out and ready to capture the best moments at the festival this weekend!
I once wrote a short story about the cop who pulled me over and read it to him while he was writing my ticket.
My pets are my best friends and they make me laugh every day.

participant_2.background:
My morning routine begins with checking on my animals and tending to the crops.
I trained hard to run a 5k and kept up my training all year.
I ate a delicious cake at my silver themed birthday party.
i like to write my own songs.
i like to work with acrylics.

content.text: Hi, I'm going to a festival this weekend and I'm so excited! What are your plans for the weekend?
I'm going to be working on my farm! I love the morning routine of checking on my animals and tending to the crops.
That sounds like a lot of work, but I'm sure it's very rewarding. Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a dog, a cat, and a few chickens. They're my best friends and they make me laugh every day.
That's so sweet! I love animals. I have a cat and a dog, too.
What kind of music do you like?
I love country music. I'm going to a festival this weekend to see my favorite band.
I love country music, too! I've been listening to a lot of Maren Morris lately.
Oh, I love Maren Morris! She's so talented.
Have you ever written a song?
Yes, I have! I actually wrote a short story about a cop who pulled me over and read it to him while he was writing my ticket.
That's so funny! I've always wanted to write a song, but I'm not very good at it.
It's not as hard as you think. Just start with a simple melody and go from there.
Maybe I'll give it a try
